com.viaoa.jfc.control

Class OATreeTableController

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JTree
            • com.viaoa.jfc.OATree
              • com.viaoa.jfc.control.OATreeTableController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OATableComponent, java.awt.dnd.DragGestureListener, java.awt.dnd.DropTargetListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.event.TreeExpansionListener, javax.swing.event.TreeSelectionListener, javax.swing.Scrollable

    public class OATreeTableController
extends OATree
implements OATableComponent
    Creates a Tree to use as a column in a Table. It also populates a Hub with all of the visible tree nodes. Note: this should only be used for a recursive treeNode See the paint method to see how it is used to render a single column cell. Hub hub = new Hub(User.class); final OATreeTableController tree = new OATreeTableController(hub); tree.setPreferredSize(15, 33); OATreeNode node = new OATreeNode(PP_Display, getRootHub(), getHub()); tree.add(node); node.add(node, OAString.cpp(User.P_Users)); // make recursive OATable table = new CustomTable(hub); table.addColumn("Users", 12, tree); ...
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
